item.title: A better NBA box score
item.description: After seeing a ton of respected NBA Twitter people — including LeBron James — complaining about poorly designed box scores, I endeavoured to improve the existing ESPN box score with a free Chrome extension. It’s now my favourite way to follow an NBA game. Between this, Twitter and league pass I’m all set. Layout Using custom CSS I updated the layout of the box score page so as the two teams sit side by side.
